app.title: WebP Converter
app.subtitle: Convert your images to WebP format with optimal compression

dropzone.title: Drop your images here
dropzone.subtitle: or click to browse
dropzone.hint: Supports PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, BMP, TIFF

presets.label: Quality Presets
presets.tooltip: Quick presets optimized for different use cases. Each balances quality, sharpness, and file size differently. Does not affect resize.
presets.customDesc: Manual configuration. Full control over all settings.
presets.photoDesc: For photographs. Balanced compression with natural look (Q:88, D:15, S:20).
presets.webDesc: Optimized for web. Good compression with enhanced clarity (Q:85, D:20, S:30).
presets.crispDesc: For UI and screenshots. High quality with sharp text and edges (Q:92, D:10, S:35).
presets.webflowLikeDesc: Minimal artifacts with balanced sharpness (Q:90, D:25, S:25). Recommended!

quality.label: Quality
quality.tooltip: WebP compression quality. 85-92 recommended for most images. Higher = larger files but fewer artifacts.

resize.label: Resize
resize.tooltip: Change output dimensions. Choose a mode and set the target size.

denoise.label: Noise Reduction
denoise.tooltip: Reduces image noise BEFORE compression. This prevents noise from becoming visible compression artifacts. Essential for clean results.

sharpen.label: Sharpness
sharpen.tooltip: Enhances edges and details. Uses threshold-based sharpening that only affects real edges, avoiding artifact amplification.

lossless.label: Lossless
lossless.tooltip: Perfect quality with no compression artifacts. Results in larger files. Best for graphics and icons.
